extra_widgets module¶

class extra_widgets.LabeledSlider(minimum, maximum, interval=1, orientation=1, labels=None, parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget

Class that creates a labelled slider with numbers showing the current value of the slider. Not being used by main program

Parameters

  • minimum (int) --

  • maximum (int) --

  • interval (int) --

  • orientation (Qt.Orientation) -- Qt.Horizontal or Qt.Vertical

  • labels (list) -- labels for the slider values, if None, the slider values are based on the minimum, maximum and interval. Labels need to be same length as the levels of the slider values

  • parent --

paintEvent(self, QPaintEvent)[source]¶
